@page "/fab/styles"
@using Syncfusion.Blazor.Buttons
@inject IJSRuntime JS;
@*Hidden:Lines*@
@inherits SampleBaseComponent
@inject NavigationManager NavigationManager




@*End:Hidden*@

<SampleDescription>
    <p>This sample demonstrates the changes that can be made to the appearance of the Floating Action Button using predefined styles.</p>
</SampleDescription>
<ActionDescription>
    <p>
        The appearance of FAB can be customized using the <code>CssClass</code> and <code>IsPrimary</code> properties. FAB provides predefined styles which can be set using the <code>CssClass</code> property.
    </p>
</ActionDescription>
<div class="control-section">
    <div class="fab-appearence-container">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                <div id="target1" class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6 fab-index">
                    <label>Primary</label>
                    <SfFab Target="#target1" title="Primary" Position="FabPosition.BottomCenter" IconCss="fab-icons fab-icon-shopping" />
                </div>
                <div id="target2" class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6 fab-index">
                    <label>Secondary</label>
                    <SfFab Target="#target2" title="Secondary" IsPrimary=false Position="FabPosition.BottomCenter" IconCss="fab-icons fab-icon-shopping" />
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                <div id="target3" class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6 fab-index">
                    <label>Outline</label>
                    <SfFab Target="#target3" title="Outline" Position="FabPosition.BottomCenter" CssClass="e-outline" IconCss="fab-icons fab-icon-shopping" />
                </div>
                <div id="target7" class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6 fab-index">
                    <label>Info</label>
                    <SfFab Target="#target7" title="Info" Position="FabPosition.BottomCenter" CssClass="e-info" IconCss="fab-icons fab-icon-shopping" />
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="row">
            <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                <div id="target4" class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6 fab-index">
                    <label>Success</label>
                    <SfFab Target="#target4" title="Success" Position="FabPosition.BottomCenter" CssClass="e-success" IconCss="fab-icons fab-icon-shopping" />
                </div>
                <div id="target5" class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6 fab-index">
                    <label>Warning</label>
                    <SfFab Target="#target5" title="Warning" Position="FabPosition.BottomCenter" CssClass="e-warning" IconCss="fab-icons fab-icon-shopping" />
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6">
                <div id="target6" class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6 fab-index">
                    <label>Danger</label>
                    <SfFab Target="#target6" title="Danger" Position="FabPosition.BottomCenter" CssClass="e-danger" IconCss="fab-icons fab-icon-shopping" />
                </div>
                <div id="target8" class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-lg-6 col-md-6 fab-index">
                    <label>Label shows on hover</label>
                    <SfFab Target="#target8" Position="FabPosition.BottomCenter" title="Shopping" CssClass="fab-hover" IconCss="fab-icons fab-icon-shopping">
                        <span class="text-container"><span class="textEle">Shopping</span></span>
                    </SfFab>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<style>
    .fab-appearence-container {
        width: 80%;
        margin: 8% auto;
        text-align: center;
        max-width: 800px;
    }

    .fab-appearence-container .col-md-6 {
        padding: 0;
    }

    .fab-hover .textEle {
        float: right;
    }

    @@media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {
        .fab-appearence-container .col-xs-12 {
            min-height: 110px;
        }
    }

    .fab-hover .text-container {
        overflow: hidden;
        width: 0;
        margin: 0;
        transition: width .5s linear 0s, margin .2s linear .5s;
    }

    .fab-hover:hover .text-container {
        width: 70px;
        margin: 0 5px;
        transition: width .5s linear .2s, margin .2s linear 0s;
    }

    .e-bigger .e-btn.fab-hover .e-btn-icon.e-icon-left,
    .e-btn.fab-hover .e-btn-icon.e-icon-left {
        margin-left: 0;
        width: 1em;
        padding: 0;
    }

    .e-bigger .e-fab.e-btn.fab-hover,
    .e-fab.e-btn.fab-hover {
        padding: 0 10px;
    }

    .e-bigger .fab-hover:hover .text-container {
        width: 75px;
    }

    body[class*="material3"].e-bigger .fab-hover:hover .text-container,
    body[class*="material3-dark"].e-bigger .fab-hover:hover .text-container {
        width: 65px;
    }

    .fab-index {
        z-index: 500 !important;
    }

    .fab-appearence-container .col-xs-12 {
        position: relative;
        margin: 15px 0;
        min-height: 100px;
    }

    @@font-face {
        font-family: 'fab-icons';
        src: url(data:application/x-font-ttf;charset=utf-8;base64,) format('truetype');
        font-weight: normal;
        font-style: normal;
    }

    [class^="fab-icon-"],
    [class*=" fab-icon-"] {
        font-family: 'fab-icons' !important;
        speak: none;
        font-size: 55px;
        font-style: normal;
        font-weight: normal;
        font-variant: normal;
        text-transform: none;
        line-height: inherit;
        -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
        -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
    }

    .fab-icon-shopping::before {
        content: "\e70c";
    }
</style>
